name: Regifted
description:
Description

You are a professional home invader, stealing gifts in 3 different levels, while trying to avoid getting spotted by the people living there.

Controls

Move - W,A,S,D

Pickup/Interact - E

Drop - Q

Sneak - Ctrl

Run - Shift

When you complete the last level the game will restart.

Put the gifts in the yellow zone

Sound Effects from Zapsplat

Character Autorigged + Animations by Mixamo
